name: Hearing Screening Prior To Hospital Discharge
description: This measure assesses the proportion of births that have been screened for hearing loss before hospital discharge.

attributes.value: Birthing facility staff should review the effectiveness and timeliness of screening relative to nursery discharge. Benchmarks set within the EHCP may trigger hospital or jurisdictional compliance activities, such as re-writing of procedural guidelines or re-training of screening staff.
attributes.name: Rationale

value_obj.value: Birthing facility staff should review the effectiveness and timeliness of screening relative to nursery discharge. Benchmarks set within the EHCP may trigger hospital or jurisdictional compliance activities, such as re-writing of procedural guidelines or re-training of screening staff.

attributes.value: HRSA Title V Block Grant MCHB Performance Measure: Percentage of newborns who have been screened for hearing before hospital discharge.
attributes.name: Reference

value_obj.value: HRSA Title V Block Grant MCHB Performance Measure: Percentage of newborns who have been screened for hearing before hospital discharge.

attributes.value: The measurement period is one calendar year but the reporting period is jurisdictionally defined.
attributes.name: Guidance

value_obj.value: The measurement period is one calendar year but the reporting period is jurisdictionally defined.

attributes.value: All live births discharged during the measurement time period born at a facility
attributes.name: Initial Patient Population

value_obj.value: All live births discharged during the measurement time period born at a facility

attributes.value: All live births discharged during the measurement time period born at a facility
attributes.name: Denominator

value_obj.value: All live births discharged during the measurement time period born at a facility

attributes.value: Patient deceased prior to discharge and has not received hearing screening.
attributes.name: Denominator Exclusions

value_obj.value: Patient deceased prior to discharge and has not received hearing screening.

attributes.value:
All live births during the measurement time period born at a facility and screened for
hearing loss prior to discharge, or not being screened due to medical reasons or medical exclusions.
attributes.name: Numerator

value_obj.value:
All live births during the measurement time period born at a facility and screened for
hearing loss prior to discharge, or not being screened due to medical reasons or medical exclusions.

attributes.value: For every patient evaluated by this measure also identify payer, race, ethnicity and sex.
